name: Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance HD
name_original: Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance HD
description:
Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance HD is an action-RPG game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 12-01-2017. It was published by Square Enix. Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance HD has a Metascore of 75, based on professional reviews. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Kingdom Hearts 3D: Dream Drop Distance HD is available on PlayStation 4.
Rie Nishi produced the game. It was directed by Tai Yasue and Tetsuya Nomura. Takeharu Ishimoto, Tsuyoshi Sekito and Yoko Shimomura scored the game.
